name: Save Stupid Friends (squiffysloth)
description:
Your stupid friends can't just stay away form trouble. But this time it's even worse,  it's monster trouble.

So what should I do ?

Save your stupid friends !! That's it !! Because you can...    maybe. 

How should I ? Use W A S D keys to move player and mouse to aim and shoot. What do I get ?

How dare you even ask such a question !! It's your FRIENDS !!!!!!!! 

Explore everything !

Developers J E E  V A N  K U R Game design Gameplay Programming Art work (All hand crafted) V A N D I T Game design Gameplay Programming A HAND DRAWN PRODUCT
